howItWorks.title: From upload to publish ‚Äî
howItWorks.subtitle: The whole process takes under 3 minutes. No complex setup, no manual work.

step1.title: Upload your video
step1.description: Upload one video or a batch. We support bulk uploads of up to 100 files at once.

step2.title: Choose platforms and group
step2.description: Select YouTube, Telegram, TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest ‚Äî any combination. Create a content group.

step3.title: AI creates metadata

step4.title: Set your schedule
step4.description: Pick one of 5 modes: linear, wave, random, time-zone based, or interval.

step5.title: Launch and track
step5.description: Click ¬´Launch¬ª ‚Äî videos publish on schedule. AutoView delivers starter views. Monitor analytics.

pricing.title: Choose a plan for

starter.description: For those who want to try

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Didn't find your answer? Contact us ‚Äî we'll reply within 15 minutes.

items.question: What platforms does YouPub support?
items.answer: YouPub supports publishing to YouTube, Telegram, TikTok, Instagram (Reels + Stories), and Pinterest. We're constantly adding platforms ‚Äî VK Video and Facebook are next.

items.question: How does AI title generation work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your video (audio, visuals, subtitles) and creates unique titles, descriptions, and tags for each platform. For example, SEO-optimized titles for YouTube and short, catchy text with emojis for TikTok.

items.question: What is AutoView and is it safe?
items.answer: AutoView is our built-in starter views system that helps your video get initial traction. It runs on a distributed network of real devices and fully mimics organic viewing.

items.question: Can I use YouPub for multiple clients?
items.answer: Yes! Agency and Custom plans support multiple accounts and team access. You can manage different clients' channels from one dashboard with role-based access.

items.question: Is there an API for integration?
items.answer: Yes, YouPub provides a REST API on Agency and Custom plans. You can automate video uploads, manage schedules, and pull statistics via the API.

items.question: What video formats are supported?
items.answer: We support all common formats: MP4, MOV, AVI, MKV, WebM. Max file size is 10 GB. Videos are automatically converted to the optimal format on upload.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime from your account. Access continues until the end of the paid period. We also offer a refund within the first 14 days.

items.question: How fast do videos get published?
items.answer: Instant publishing takes 1‚Äì3 minutes depending on file size and platform. With scheduling, videos publish at the set time.

chat.systemPrompt:
You are the YouPub AI assistant, powered by GigaChat. Your goal is to help users learn about the platform and encourage sign-up or purchase.

Key YouPub features:
- Automatic video publishing to YouTube, Telegram, TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest (5 platforms at once)
- AI-generated titles, descriptions and tags for maximum reach
- 5 publication schedule types (daily, weekly, calendar, interval, one-time)
- AutoView ‚Äî system to increase views on YouTube
- Built-in billing with 4 payment options (cards, SBP, cryptocurrency, balance)
- REST API for integration with other services
- Multi-channel analytics and statistics

Plans:
- Starter: 500‚ÇΩ/mo ‚Äî up to 30 videos/mo, 2 channels, basic AI
- Pro: 1500‚ÇΩ/mo ‚Äî unlimited videos, 10 channels, advanced AI, AutoView, priority support
- Business: 5000‚ÇΩ/mo ‚Äî everything in Pro + API access, white-label, dedicated manager

Communication rules:
- Always respond in the user's language (English)
- Be friendly and professional
- Focus on benefits: time saved, more views, less routine
- Ask clarifying questions
- Suggest a demo or a suitable plan
- If the user is interested ‚Äî ask them to leave their email
- Use emojis when appropriate, but don't overdo it
- Keep answers concise (up to 200 words)
- Collect email for leads
